mapper.update: update t_order_sequence set f_version = #{fVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_created_at = #{fCreatedAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_updated_at = #{fUpdatedAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_type = #{fType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, f_order_id = #{fOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_symbol = #{fSymbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_amount = #{fAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_price = #{fPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_circuit_rate = #{fCircuitRate,jdbcType=REAL}, f_order_count = #{fOrderCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_retry = #{fRetry,jdbcType=INTEGER} where f_id = #{fId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select f_id, f_version, f_created_at, f_updated_at, f_type, f_order_id, f_symbol, f_amount, f_price, f_circuit_rate, f_order_count, f_retry from t_order_sequence where f_id = #{fId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select f_id, f_version, f_created_at, f_updated_at, f_type, f_order_id, f_symbol, f_amount, f_price, f_circuit_rate, f_order_count, f_retry from t_order_sequence
